revised_title: Effects of Strain on the Crystalline Structure of Lead: A Study of Recrystallization and Orientation Changes
tldr: This study investigates the effects of strain on the crystalline structure of lead, focusing on the recrystallization and changes in orientation that occur during and after the application of strain. The research demonstrates that strain can cause local differences in orientation and that recrystallization occurs in strained crystals, both during and after the strain is applied.
